page.title: 05FAMILY LIFE
page.content: On rising in the morning we go to the bathroom and clean our teeth with"Aquafresh 3"and wash our bodies with"Imperial Leather"soap. We breakfast then in the dining-room -breakfastbeing the cereal"All-Bran or toast.Coffee or tea is drunk whilst watching Breakfast Time on television. In our bedrooms we don our school uniform - grey skirt and jumper,blue blouse,blue and maroon tie and black shoes. We leave home at about 8.3O. I call for Clare. School begins at 9.1O when our form mistress Miss Amphlett takes registration. School finishes at 3.55 Lessons vary daily e.g. Mathematics,English, French, Science, History, Geography, Religious Education, Music, and Physical Education. This timetable continues five days per week except in holiday
